<a id="EditorResourceTooltipPlugin"></a>

# EditorResourceTooltipPlugin

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A plugin that advanced tooltip for its handled resource type.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Resource tooltip plugins are used by [FileSystemDock](FileSystemDock.md) to generate customized tooltips for specific resources. E.g. tooltip for a [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) displays a bigger preview and the texture's dimensions.

A plugin must be first registered with [FileSystemDock.add_resource_tooltip_plugin()](FileSystemDock.md#FileSystemDock_method_add_resource_tooltip_plugin). When the user hovers a resource in filesystem dock which is handled by the plugin, [_make_tooltip_for_path()](EditorResourceTooltipPlugin.md#EditorResourceTooltipPlugin_private_method__make_tooltip_for_path) is called to create the tooltip. It works similarly to [Control._make_custom_tooltip()](Control.md#Control_private_method__make_custom_tooltip).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="EditorResourceTooltipPlugin_private_method__handles"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_handles**\ (\ type\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourceTooltipPlugin_private_method__handles)

Return ``true`` if the plugin is going to handle the given [Resource](Resource.md) `type`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourceTooltipPlugin_private_method__make_tooltip_for_path"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Control](Control.md) **_make_tooltip_for_path**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md), metadata\: [Dictionary](Dictionary.md), base\: [Control](Control.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourceTooltipPlugin_private_method__make_tooltip_for_path)

Create and return a tooltip that will be displayed when the user hovers a resource under the given `path` in filesystem dock.

The `metadata` dictionary is provided by preview generator (see [EditorResourcePreviewGenerator._generate()](EditorResourcePreviewGenerator.md#EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__generate)).

\ `base` is the base default tooltip, which is a [VBoxContainer](VBoxContainer.md) with a file name, type and size labels. If another plugin handled the same file type, `base` will be output from the previous plugin. For best result, make sure the base tooltip is part of the returned [Control](Control.md).

\ **Note:** It's unadvised to use [ResourceLoader.load()](ResourceLoader.md#ResourceLoader_method_load), especially with heavy resources like models or textures, because it will make the editor unresponsive when creating the tooltip. You can use [request_thumbnail()](EditorResourceTooltipPlugin.md#EditorResourceTooltipPlugin_method_request_thumbnail) if you want to display a preview in your tooltip.

\ **Note:** If you decide to discard the `base`, make sure to call [Node.queue_free()](Node.md#Node_method_queue_free), because it's not freed automatically.

```
    func _make_tooltip_for_path(path, metadata, base):
        var t_rect = TextureRect.new()
        request_thumbnail(path, t_rect)
        base.add_child(t_rect) # The TextureRect will appear at the bottom of the tooltip.
        return base
```


<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourceTooltipPlugin_method_request_thumbnail"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **request_thumbnail**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md), control\: [TextureRect](TextureRect.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourceTooltipPlugin_method_request_thumbnail)

Requests a thumbnail for the given [TextureRect](TextureRect.md). The thumbnail is created asynchronously by [EditorResourcePreview](EditorResourcePreview.md) and automatically set when available.
